channel.title: Why Blacklists and 'Frowned Upon' Rules Work
channel.description:
This video game truly does have some of the best communities I've ever seen. World of Warcraft scamming is frowned upon, and Players get 'Blacklisted' for doing it. Your R.S.P.S. will have much less Scams and wanna-be Con-Artists/Social Engineers/UB3RUB3RL337|-|4><0R3r$|\|0|\|07R34LL'/L0L - if you take measures such as the aforementioned. If anyone has questions in regards as to what exactly 'Frowned Upon Rules', and Blacklisting is, I will be more than happy to explain it.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eBm1G.jpg[/img]
This, however, may not be as effective for R.S.P.S. with modifiers, such as a high experience rate. The positives to doing this and forming 'Frowned Upon' Rules far outweigh the cons though.
P.S. This is a followup on my Thread entitled "Tips and Tricks on how to be a Dictator!".
P.P.S. Yes, before anyone asks, I let the person scam me on purpose to serve as an example for this Thread.

If you mean an additiona postscript, than it is P.P.S.: post post scriptum. Nevertheless, I would write both them without any dots: PS and PPS.
